A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is dead. Disney will be sucking it dry and banking on the legacy of the name and franchise to make as much money as possible. Say what you will about the prequels and force awakens but at least it didnt disrespect and ruin the characters and legacy that we love so much. Fuck Rian and fuck Disney. Money hungry lazy pigs. The damage is irreversible and episode 9 is already looking bleak.
